name: Samsons
description:
The '''Samsons''' (stylised '''SamSonS''') are an [[Indonesia]]n [[pop-rock]] [[band (music)|band]] formed in [[Jakarta]] in 2003. They have released five albums and two singles.

The band has four members: [[Singing|singer]] Adrian Martadinata, [[guitarist]]s Irfan Aulia and Erik Partogi Siagian, and [[bassist]] Aldri Dataviadi. Former members include vocalist Aria Dinata, [[drummer]]s Chandra "Konde" Christanto, and Bambang "Bams" Reguna Bukit.
